pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahū patte sannicayaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.3_0: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bahū patte sannicayaṁ karissanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.5_0: pattavāṇijjaṁ vā samaṇā sakyaputtiyā karissanti āmattikāpaṇaṁ vā pasāressantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.6_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.9_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.13_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekapattaṁ dhāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.15_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.16.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu atirekapattaṁ dhāreyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.17_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa atirekapatto uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.2_0: Āyasmā ca ānando taṁ pattaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.14_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.16_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.7_0: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā ukkaṭṭho patto majjhimo patto omako patto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.8_0: Ukkaṭṭho nāma patto aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.9_0: Majjhimo nāma patto nāḷikodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.10_0: Omako nāma patto patthodanaṁ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṁ khādanaṁ tadupiyaṁ byañjanaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.14_0: Nissajjitabbo saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.16_0: Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.23_0: Ayaṁ patto itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyo saṅghassa nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.24_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho imaṁ pattaṁ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.25_0: Tena bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.32_0: Ayaṁ patto itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyo āyasmantānaṁ nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.33_0: Yadāyasmantānaṁ pattakallaṁ, āyasmantā imaṁ pattaṁ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.34_0: Tena bhikkhunā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.51_0: Nissaggiyaṁ pattaṁ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.56_0: antodasāhaṁ adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, bhijjati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṁ gaṇhanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nissaṭṭhapattaṁ na denti.
